attributes.action: Abolish Inheritance Tax On The Primary Home And Investments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inheritance tax should be abolished, with the latest statiistic that almost 9.4 million hourses now are over the required threshold which allows them to be taxed 40%. The death of a loved one is hard enough on its own. Why should you pay tax to leave what you own to someone.
